trans-unit.source: Provides a specialized <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).
trans-unit.target: 提供一个专用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />，已使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 针对加载图像进行了优化。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 主要存在是为了支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]语法和引入位图加载，未定义的附加属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>发出信号初始化已完成。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 使用创建的对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将自动初始化和属性更改将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrate how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to use as the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用作 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> class by using the supplied <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uriSource" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uriSource" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the <paramref name="uriSource" /> parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 <paramref name="uriSource" /> 参数指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to use as the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用作 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> that specifies the caching requirements for images that are obtained using HTTP.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />，用于指定使用 HTTP 获得的图像的缓存要求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> class with an image whose source is a <see cref="T:System.Uri" />, and is cached according to the provided <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用源为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 并且根据所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 进行缓存的图像初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> 使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="uriSource" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uriSource" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by the <paramref name="uriSource" /> parameter is not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 <paramref name="uriSource" /> 参数指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> context.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值代表当前 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 上下文的基 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 当前上下文的基 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 初始化开始。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必须之间执行属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>已初始化，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>与一组使用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 当前正被初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> to use for this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> being used for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType> if you wish to close a stream used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果你想要关闭流用于创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要图像，并且由垃圾回收器处理清理。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>通过使用代码。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />，所克隆对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> used for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions.None" />。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>通过使用代码。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CreateOptions" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将图像解码为的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 将图像解码为的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>也是设置时，忽略位图纵横比。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>未设置，纵横比保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]编解码器本机将图像解码为指定的大小; 其他编解码器在其原始大小将图像解码和缩放为所需大小的图像。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 图像解码后的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>也是设置时，忽略位图纵横比。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>未设置，纵横比保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]编解码器本机将图像解码为指定的大小; 其他编解码器在其原始大小将图像解码和缩放为所需大小的图像。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必须之间执行属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>已初始化，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>与一组使用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource" /> properties are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit" /> method is called without first calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit" /> 方法，而无需先调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> is currently downloading content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 是否正在下载内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> is downloading content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 正在下载内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.IsDownloading%2A> property by using code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.IsDownloading%2A>通过使用代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is emitted to a <xref:System.Windows.MessageBox> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 属性的值被发送至<xref:System.Windows.MessageBox>作为<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> does not support the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Metadata" /> property and will throw a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 不支持 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Metadata" /> 属性，并且将引发 <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException" />。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to read the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Metadata" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Metadata" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> is rotated to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 旋转到的角度。

trans-unit.source: The rotation that is used for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的旋转。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0" />。

trans-unit.source: Rotation is performed after scaling.
trans-unit.target: 缩放后执行旋转。

trans-unit.source: This means that an image that has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Rotation%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate90>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> of 10, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，映像具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Rotation%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate90>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>为 10，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>的 5 将导致映像具有 5 宽度和高度为 10。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to rotate an image by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用旋转图像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]和代码。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Rotation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.Rotation" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangle that is used as the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的源的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is used as the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 用作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的源的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.SourceRect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.SourceRect" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stream source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的流的源。

trans-unit.source: The stream source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 的流的源。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>都设置，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType> if you wish to close the stream after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> is created.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果你想要关闭后的流<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>创建。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图，并且由垃圾回收器处理清理。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the caching policy for images that come from an HTTP source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示来自 HTTP 源的图像的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 当前上下文的基 <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicy%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicy%2A> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicy" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicy" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicyProperty> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriCachePolicyProperty> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage" /> 源。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A> value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>都设置，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.StreamSource%2A>值将被忽略。
